Parameters.Name: DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: Correct response

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Get Door Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServiceDoor12/DoorService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Door Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check that the DUT returned Door Control service information STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that Capabilities element is correct STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Parse Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Compare Capabilities STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY

Test.TestName: DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: Fault on the GetServices request
Test.Description: DUT returns fault on the GetServices request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DOORCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET DOOR CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
STEP 1 - Get Door Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServiceDoor12/DoorService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Door Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetServices(Boolean IncludeCapability) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 1014 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
